title: Briar patch
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| briar patch P [![Briar patch.png](/images/5/53/Briar_patch.png)](/File:Briar_patch.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                          | 9-20                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                              | 10                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                          | 0                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                 | 0                                                                                                                                                                                |

| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                | 0                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                          | Immune                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                 | [rPois+](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment")                                                                                    |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                       | [Fire](/Fire "Fire")                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                           | Amphibious                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                            | [Brainless](/Category:Brainless_intelligence "Category:Brainless intelligence")                                                                                                  |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                        | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                                                                                                   |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                        | [Plant](/Category:Plant_holiness "Category:Plant holiness")                                                                                                                      |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                    | [Small](/Category:Small_monsters "Category:Small monsters")                                                                                                                      |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                    | plant, briar patch                                                                                                                                                               |
| Flags                                                                                   | [Stationary](/Stationary "Stationary") [No experience gain](/No_experience_gain "No experience gain") [Harmless](/Harmless "Harmless") [Spiny](/Category:Spiny "Category:Spiny") |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A tangled cluster of thorny briars, sharp enough to pierce thick hide and armour. Though the gaps in the copse are plentiful enough to fire missiles through, walking through it looks like a painful prospect. |

## Useful Info

**Briar patches** are short lived obstacles created by [thorn hunters](/Thorn_hunter "Thorn hunter") and [Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas")' Wall of Briars ability. Although they won't attack you, briars are [spiny](/Spiny "Spiny") - attacking them in melee causes you to take 5d4 damage. Like [bushes](/Bush "Bush"), briars do not block ranged attacks. Briars created by thorn hunters will expire quickly after you kill their creator.

## Tips & Tricks

- Ranged attacks and spells can be fired past briars. [Penetrating](/Penetration "Penetration") attacks can damage both the briar patch and thorn hunter at the same time. Keep in mind that monsters can also attack you through briars.
- [Reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") melee weapons can attack briars safely.

## History

- Briar patches were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

Briar patch

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
briar patch P 
HP 9-20
HD 10
XP 0
Speed 0
AC 10
EV 0
Will Immune



Resistances rPois+
rDrown
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Fire
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Plant
Size Small
Type plant, briar patch
Flags Stationary
No experience gain
Harmless
Spiny
A tangled cluster of thorny briars, sharp enough to pierce thick hide and armour. Though the gaps in the copse are plentiful enough to fire missiles through, walking through it looks like a painful prospect.

Useful Info

Briar patches are short lived obstacles created by thorn hunters and Fedhas' Wall of Briars ability. Although they won't attack you, briars are spiny - attacking them in melee causes you to take 5d4 damage. Like bushes, briars do not block ranged attacks. Briars created by thorn hunters will expire quickly after you kill their creator.

Tips & Tricks

  • Ranged attacks and spells can be fired past briars. Penetrating attacks can damage both the briar patch and thorn hunter at the same time. Keep in mind that monsters can also attack you through briars.
  • Reaching melee weapons can attack briars safely.

History

  • Briar patches were added in 0.14.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Briar patches''' are short lived obstacles created by [[thorn hunter]]s and [[Fedhas]]' Wall of Briars ability. Although they won't attack you, briars are [[spiny]] - attacking them in melee causes you to take 5d4 damage. Like [[bush]]es, briars do not block ranged attacks. Briars created by thorn hunters will expire quickly after you kill their creator.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Ranged attacks and spells can be fired past briars. [[Penetration|Penetrating]] attacks can damage both the briar patch and thorn hunter at the same time. Keep in mind that monsters can also attack you through briars.
*[[Reaching]] melee weapons can attack briars safely.

==History==
*Briar patches were added in [[0.14]].
